profile.name: Jeferson Euclides
intro: Hi there! My name is Jeferson Euclides, I'm a Software Engineer located in Brazil working sometimes as a freelancer, but mostly as a fulltime employee. My career counts with experience in distributed and on-site teams, where the majority of the time was spent as a remote developer.

I have a strong technical background in JavaScript and a core knowledge base in Node.js and AWS services; I also build frontend solutions using React or other frontend-based stacks using JS. I define business logic and implement solutions that affect the availability, functionality and reliability of applications. Being highly versatile - learning quickly - and available to work in any time zone.
experienceIntro: I have experience with a handful of languages, like Python, Java and PHP.
However my expertise alongside my professional experience lies on JavaScript, where I have built and delivered several applications throughout more than five years of experience.

description: Remote Backend developer helping the development of mid-size education SaaS company based in NYC.
Responsible for building and maintaining https://moonmail.io & https://monei.net. Main responsibilities are focused in Back End service development using AWS Serverless framework and NodeJS.
Full Stack JavaScript Developer working mainly with NodeJS and GraphQLJS. Development and maintenance of JavaScript APIs.
Development and maintenance of Node.JS APIs migrated from PHP
Web Developer in MEAN (MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS, NodeJS). Responsible for the development and maintenance of web solutions.
Web Developer, but with more stuff
